name: ListDatasets
description:
Retrieve a list of datasets for a specific project.

Use this tool to get all datasets associated with a particular project by providing the project ID.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to access datasets for. Use /api/projects/ to find this ID.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: dataset_ids
parameters.description: A list of dataset IDs. Can include multiple IDs separated by commas.

value_schema.description: Multiple values may be separated by commas.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of results returned per page. This determines how many datasets are retrieved in one API call.

value_schema.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: initial_result_index
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

value_schema.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: order_datasets_by
parameters.description: Specify the order of dataset results. Options: 'created_at', '-created_at', 'updated_at', '-updated_at'.

value_schema.description:
Ordering

* `created_at` - Created At
* `-created_at` - Created At (descending)
* `updated_at` - Updated At
* `-updated_at` - Updated At (descending)

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: Search within dataset name, description, or metadata using a keyword or phrase.

value_schema.description: Search in name, description, or metadata

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id__in
parameters.description: Multiple values may be separated by commas.

value_schema.description: Multiple values may be separated by commas.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

value_schema.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

value_schema.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description:
Ordering

* `created_at` - Created At
* `-created_at` - Created At (descending)
* `updated_at` - Updated At
* `-updated_at` - Updated At (descending)

value_schema.description:
Ordering

* `created_at` - Created At
* `-created_at` - Created At (descending)
* `updated_at` - Updated At
* `-updated_at` - Updated At (descending)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in name, description, or metadata

value_schema.description: Search in name, description, or metadata

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
